name: Through Our Blood
description:
Made for Scorejam 23!

This is a little base building game that plays off the survival theme by having the player sacrifice their units for the survival of their city.  I definitely bit off a bit more than I could chew but I think the end result is pretty fun!

How to play:

Click the buttons at the bottom of the screen to recruit units.  Click units to give orders such as mining, building, or defending your crystal.  You can also order units to sacrifice themselves.  Keep an eye on your blood count in the top of the screen---if it reaches 0 you'll lose!

Assets Used:

Adventure by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
